11. On-the-Job Training:
On-the-job training is provided to existing or newly appointed employees to update their knowledge of procedures, rules, and sector developments. Employees may also be nominated for external training on the recommendation of their supervisor, HR, and with the CEO’s final approval.

12. Management Development:
NIDA-Pak improves managerial performance by imparting knowledge, shaping attitudes, and enhancing skills. Managers are exposed to learning opportunities while performing their duties.

13. Succession Planning:
NIDA-Pak identifies and develops staff with potential to fill senior-level positions in the future, ensuring the availability of capable employees for leadership roles as they arise.

14. Job Rotation:
Job rotation broadens employee experience by allowing them to work in different roles, identifying strengths and weaknesses. Salary adjustments may be applied temporarily when employees rotate into higher or project-based roles. Employees must complete assigned tasks before the rotation takes effect.
Recruitment Policy Assessment 6 of 9

Which of the following best reflects NIDA-Pak’s approach to staff development and capacity building?

answers.option: Only external training is provided, and job rotation is not part of the organization’s capacity-building approach.
Succession planning is optional, and management development is only conducted when vacancies are available.
Employees must rely solely on self-study and personal initiative for training and development at NIDA-Pak.
NIDA-Pak uses on-the-job training, management development, succession planning, and job rotation to enhance skills, prepare future leaders, and broaden employee experience.

content.correct: Correct! NIDA-Pak combines on-the-job training, management development, succession planning, and job rotation to build skills, strengthen management, and prepare capable staff for future leadership roles.
content.incorrect: Sorry, that’s not correct. The correct answer is that NIDA-Pak emphasizes on-the-job training, management development, succession planning, and job rotation as key methods for employee development and capacity building.
